item.title: RL4AA'23: 1st Collaboration Workshop on Reinforcement Learning for Autonomous Accelerators
item.description: Links to the workshop Indico page of the workshop. Github repository for the hands-on tutorial.

item.title: Learning-based Optimisation of Particle Accelerators Under Partial Observability Without Real-World Training
item.description: Abstract In recent work, it has been shown that reinforcement learning (RL) is capable of solving a variety of problems at sometimes super-human performance levels. But despite continued advances in the field, applying RL to complex real-world control and optimisation problems has proven difficult. In this contribution, we demonstrate how to successfully apply RL to the optimisation of a highly complex real-world machine – specifically a linear particle accelerator – in an only partially observable setting and without requiring training on the real machine.
